results.title: Simvastatin in the Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Review
results.text_hl: The survival benefits are then analyzed by combining the re-positioned drugs with conventional @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ treatment methods. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is a clinically commonly used @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ drug and exerts the effect of preventing @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@.
